metadata.title: CVE-2022-27385 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in the componentUsed_tables_and_const_cache::used_tables_and_const_cache_join of MariaDBServer v10.7 and below was discovered to allow attackers to cause a Denialof Service (DoS) via specially crafted SQL statements.

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.3 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
